website_summaries.verdict: Pop-up shower tent with easy-access zipper door. A spacious tent that offers plenty of room for showering and changing.
pros: Partial floor design allows for  water drainage
Quality zipper action for the main compartment for easy access
Ventilation windows in the roof and sides
Includes a stitched pocket for storing toiletries
Flexible steel frame is easy to put up and collapse again into provided travel bag
cons: You may need to replace the included tent stakes with more substantial ones

customer_reviews.title: Roomy Home for Your Camp Throne
customer_reviews.text: There are many types and varietals of portable popup privacy huts, but for big guys, this is the winner. I bought this to be able to have a camp shower or a folding toilet in the woods for the women that often go camping with my group of friends. When I began exploring the many types of shelters, I could only envision small cramped locker sized spaces without enough freedom to move. This is fantastically roomy and provides an excellent home for your throne. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P

customer_reviews.title: Finally used it. Falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in November of 2018 for our RV. We are using it for the first time since purchasing. It is being used during the Covid 19 quarantine by 2 family members. The fabric around the base frame work is wearing out. I will probably have to throw it out when the quarantine is done. I may try to fix it with duct tape. I looked for a way to contact the company in the Amazon link, but didn't find one.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Outhouse
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a hunting trip to CO this October and it worked out perfectly as an outhouse. Easy to set up and take down. I can see may uses for it at home and in the woods. Very nice product. Please excuse the finger in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Greg R.

customer_reviews.title: It works great as a potty room for camping
customer_reviews.text: It works great as a potty room for camping . Has no floor, I use a old tarp cut to fit. Works just great. Enough room inside for 5 gallon bucket and a folding camp chair. The string for towels is fragile . But its perfect for light at night. Wish the zipper went higher up on one side of door, but make sure you stake it down . The wind will take it like a kites . Was a good purchase . Oh folding it up.. lay flat, step on one end, bring the other over to your feet. Push down on the hump, it will make a circle so you can get it back in the bag..
customer_reviews.author: Leafpeeker1

customer_reviews.title: Great for port-potty, but don't use with a solar shower
customer_reviews.text: This will work great for a port-potty or some shower setups. I would recommend building some kind of portable frame to fit inside if you want to use a solar shower that holds more than a gallon of water as there's no way to secure it above without it collapsing. Thus my 2-star Sturdiness & overall rating. If using in a windy area, you will need to use the tie-downs in addition to the corner stake points. Held up to windy conditions in the Mojave desert for a week without any wear or tear.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S

customer_reviews.title: This can be used for anything
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be just what we needed at work. Since I am a camper, I needed to come up with something portable, easy to set up and take down, for our Alterations Department. It makes a fantastic changing room for our customers. It has plenty of room and we can even put a chair in it for customers to sit on for changing. When I was researching for something to fill our needs, the first thing I thought, was, check out something in camping that could be used. Perfect and I bought it. Great product for the money and I would buy it again and might do so for myself to take camping!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kitkat

customer_reviews.title: Buy tent stakes and replace the paperclips
customer_reviews.text: Good size but this thing isn't even slight breeze-resistant, let alone wind proof. The stakes that come with this thing are laughable. Think of a somewhat beefy paperclip. Luckily we had some spare wall tent stakes that we used to hold this tent to planet earth. Without these stakes, this tent would have ended up in orbit or at least in another state.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: Best money I’ve ever spent. You can take this thing anywhere. Camping, to the beach, literally anywhere you want to be able to change in a pinch. I see lots of surfers pop this up outside their car and change. I’ve taken it camping and to outdoor locations for models and clients to change in. Sturdy enough that wind doesn’t typically knock it over without the anchors. I beat it up fairly well and it seems sturdy enough to get through a few years. About 5 pounds and 2 feet in diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Modagirl

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: Using this for a quick changing, bathroom, shower room while on a 6 week camping trip. I set it up right in the middle of my living room just to test my ability to fold it back up (I'd seen others struggle with it.) This folded easily, just as the instructions directed. Super sturdy, if anything, the ground pegs are a little simple in design and the rope would be better if reflecting but you can buy you're own versions of both of those. The tent pops up instantly and down in a minute. 2 zip open sections for letting flies/hot air out or shower hose in. Small mess pocket for phone, tp, keys, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Solved my cooking problem in "beach wind"
customer_reviews.text: I had moved my barbecue to every sheltered place I could think of and even built a shroud to go around it in windy weather and nothing worked. I love the cool ocean breezes in Bodega Bay except when I am cooking on my grill. I hoped this would work and oh my God does it ever. Unzip the ceiling and the small side window and the smoke goes right out the top! I have a small portable grilling table set up inside and it makes the perfect outdoor kitchen in windy conditions. Before I was unable to use my grill on low flame in even the slightest breeze, that has been remedied completely. I LOVE this thing!
customer_reviews.author: NevaDan

customer_reviews.title: You Need To Be A Rocket Scientist To Disassemble
customer_reviews.text: Tried disassembling with wife for 30 minutes and couldn't do it even with instructions (which had pictures). The instructions had a phone number which refers you back to Amazon. We needed some 'visual handholding'. Then it occurred to me that what we needed was probably a video on Amazon which we watched and were finally able to accomplish (in 45 minutes). Unfortunately one of the poles broke during our process and Amazon was very gracious to exchange it at no cost. Thank you Amazon! What was missing in the instructions was a reference and link to the youtube video for this vendor and model.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We use this to shower in the back of our converted camper van and it actually works great! Even keeps in the heat!!!! Showering near the ocean outside in the beginning of January and we were nice and toasty! Super easy to set up and to put away! The only thing I’d recommend is some tarp or platform for the ground as the thin strip they have doesn’t work if you’re on dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Tarron

customer_reviews.title: So Far it Looks Great.
customer_reviews.text: In Truth I have not had the chance to set up the Pop Up Shower and Dressing privacy shelter yet do to typical spring weather here. From what I can tell so far it should work out fine. It has all the features I was looking for including the extra tie downs for use in windy weather. I plan on using it for my porta potty, and eventually a solar shower for longer camping trips. I will give a updated full review of the product after using it. For now I am giving it five stars for it's fast delivery and the companies email communications.
customer_reviews.author: Willgo

customer_reviews.title: works great for a camp shower
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this for a camp shower. Only pain point is the strip of fabric on the ground to keep your feet clean which really doesn't work. It gets wet and muddy or sandy from the ground and feet are still dirty. Not a big deal, shower in flip flops. Pain point for any pop up shower...takes awhile to dry before you can put it away. Lastly, I don't believe it's a trick to make me put away the shower, I honestly don't think my husband can figure out how to fold it back up compact.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Folding it Was a huge pain in the ass. Good luck.
customer_reviews.text: It has a lot of room for my toilet. Very easy to assemble. Spent 15 minutes trying to fold it. I'm a 30 year Contractor so it wasn't lack of skill. When I did get it to fall I have no idea how I did it. I opened it again so that I would remember for next time and have the same problem all over again. If you get it To fold put it away and consider yourself lucky. Three people tried after seeing the video. We were sober but I would suggest beer next time.
customer_reviews.author: mickey

customer_reviews.title: Very Tall and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tent for my clients to get changed in the middle of no-where and it's exactly what I need. Strong, easy to disassemble unlike the other one that I had.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Barnhardt

customer_reviews.title: Good little privacy tent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I had to replace a privacy tent that was impossible to put away. This one is easy to put up\tear down compared to the other brand and roomier. While not completely waterproof, it drips at the zipper, we had a ton of rain our last trip, and it was much drier in the tent than outside. I put my bucket towards the back corner and it stayed almost completely dry. Only down I could find is there is no mesh for the window. Since I'm using it as a bathroom, it results in more bugs inside. Unzip the top and that does provide a good escape route though. Overall, very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Simple, compact, easy setup and breakdown, and good value.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Once you learn how to fold it up it’s a breeze, only takes a few seconds. I was also able to fit my entire hot shower setup, including 50 feet of hose, electric pump, filters, and power cords inside the tent carry case along with the tent. Light weight, easy to clean, and strong enough to hang a hose and shower head from.
customer_reviews.author: Richard V.

customer_reviews.title: Can withstand the elements
customer_reviews.text: Had this shower tent outside exposed to the elements for 6 months ..wind, rain, sun beating on it all day and night and it held up not a single tear! The only small challenge was closing it once I took it down other then that I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Spacious!
customer_reviews.text: This toilet/shower tent was everything!!! Saved my life haha! I’m so glad I bought it even though at first I was hesitant about the price but every dollar was worth it!! Its more spacious than I thought! Has enough room to change comfortably, to use the toilet, or to shower. And most importantly, it’s not see through!! Not even at night.✨ I had friends and family members ask where I got it! If you go out camping you definitely need it! I HIGHLY recommend it!!! 🙏🏽
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Case handle came torn
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically because of its size and I'll say for sure I'm happy with that. It's plenty spacious for a quick shower. As it just arrived I can't comment on its durability but the fact that the carrying case came torn before I even had a chance to use it doesn't leave me with a ton of confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: No bad for a large pop up changing room....a bit difficult to fold up the first time but once you get the hang of it, things go more smoothly. Does take up a lot of room if you are in a small space but is useful. The zippers were all split when it came but with nylon zippers I just had to zip them around and pull on them and was able to get them to work again. No problem!
customer_reviews.author: Judy G

customer_reviews.title: quick setup, a nightmare to repack
customer_reviews.text: It is a pop-up tent, so it sets up in a few seconds. Good luck getting it packed back into the bag. The instructions show you the method to repack the tent but they don't point out that bands must twist back into their original coil. If the bands don't twist properly it is a bit of a mess that barely fits back in the bag. My suggestion: Ditch the pop-up. Get a straight poled tent. Yes, it takes a bit longer to set up, but you will spend twice as long trying to wrestle the pop-up into the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect As Clothes Changing Rooms!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two to use as changing rooms (ie, green room) during a dance performance at a community festival. As women we were able to fit two people changing at once in each tent/pod. Just what we needed! They were put up and taken down easily (in seconds). It wasn’t windy that day, so I can’t speak to what they’d be like in bad weather. But they were perfect for what we needed! Zippers easily moved up and down for our many costume quick changes.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: I guarantee you won't regret buying this
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely satisfied with my purchase of this pop up restroom/changing room. First off it's larger then I expected and the quality exceeded my expectations as it is well constructed for as cheap as it is to buy. I hate using public restrooms especially when camping so now I can avoid this all together which is awesome. Seriously who really wants to walk to the bathroom in the middle of the night just to use the bathroom while camping? Not me and now I don't have to. This is a must have!!
customer_reviews.author: J-M

customer_reviews.title: More room and height, nice
customer_reviews.text: We have a smaller one, same design more or less but cramped compared to this one. I am 6'2" and 180 lbs and it was plenty of room for 5 gal bucket pot and to use as shower. For some reason, this one is much easier to pack up when finished. The other smaller ones look same but man this one is a breeze. I hope it last many camping trips and if not they keep up making these at this price and quality. I like it. Used many times last fall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are in a windy area must use larger ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are in a windy area must use larger anchors base and strings preferably. Otherwise you may find it a couple of campsites over.
customer_reviews.author: Hilarity_ensued72

customer_reviews.title: Copa cabana
customer_reviews.text: Thing is really cool and very practical and wonderful to have. The only problem is it took 4 adults 10 minutes to figure out how to fold it up & put it back in the bag. Im sure we'll figure it out!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time for something different! We love it, though.
customer_reviews.text: A little bit different, but we're currently using this as a 'time machine' for an extended homeschool project, and it's great! I have 3 children in there, plus a 'viewing monitor', and it's plenty big enough. We will also use it as an outdoor tent for a portable toilet and sink, but are first having lots of fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: J Mac

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works good for what its intended for. It is a little difficult at first folding back up to store in its case, But other than that. This is a good changing or portable toilet tent.
customer_reviews.author: Paul n.

customer_reviews.title: Awkward but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Easy pop-up, used for outdoor shower and big enough to put portable potty inside. I purchased a separate shower deck though, that vinyl flooring piece is useless when showering outside. Had I used it my feet would've never gotten clean. It's hard to fold back into shape but my wife figured it out. The hooks are flimsy, my portable shower barely stayed hooked on. I have the electric pump that uses a bucket. I wouldn't recommend a solar shower bag to hook onto this.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs SCL

customer_reviews.title: This is Fantastic! IT is a little hard to fold back ...
customer_reviews.text: This is Fantastic! IT is a little hard to fold back up, so definitely practice a bit if you're going to use this as a dressing room for your clients. I use it for photo shoots. It is plenty of room for someone to change in. I love the privacy it offers. It is pretty light weight and easy to take anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but...
customer_reviews.text: While this has been subject to some mild wind since it was purchased, it should have held up better. The roof opening ripped around the zipper area while trying to zip it closed, I presume from UV and being in the hot sun that weakens the fabric. It’s also tearing along the seams on the bottom wear it stakes into the ground. The seams aren’t strong.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Petrelli

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping bathroom/shower
customer_reviews.text: Great product for camping. Used it as a shower and bought a portable toilet. I was afraid you would be able to see a shadow during the day. But no, can’t see anything which is great. The ceiling opens up and has two windows to let air in. No floor, just a small placement for your feet. Which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Recendez

customer_reviews.title: better than those cramped smaller versions
customer_reviews.text: excellent size!!!! tall & wide enough to move & turn great dressing room, shower, potty we tied ours to the trees as well as staking down difficult to fold carry case is crap (handle seams tore instantly)
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Tall and well-made
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for quite a while now and am very pleased with this pop up tent! Took a few times to know how to collapse it properly but then I got the hang of it. I’m 6ft tall and needed a taller one mainly to get in and out of my thicker wetsuits. Works great for showering outside too in order to spare filling my grey water tanks! Definitely sturdy and highly recommend! No tears or issues thus far. Made well.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little pop-up shower/change room
customer_reviews.text: We took this on our latest camping trip and it does what's advertised. To set it up is as easy as removing it from the carry bag, removing the cover straps and watch it pop open magically like Harry Potter cast a spell on it! Now, folding it up was a bit more challenging, but I think that it's with most of these pop up items. We had a great laugh seeing how each family member attempted to out do to last trying to get the shower back in its carry bag. Now...Overall I'm really happy with this this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Sardinha de Lange

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The s thing is great for the kids to use outside in our garage for privacy while we’re swimming in the pool... keeps kids out of your clean house with dripping water... well made. Easy to pop up and down, love and would recommend ! Ty
customer_reviews.author: Wildchild

customer_reviews.title: Changing room for pool
customer_reviews.text: Great for changing room for pool . Very spacious and veryeasy to setup..
customer_reviews.author: Firas-13

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected - a great size for our own personal potty situation. My only quibble would be with the door opening - it seems like a C opening would’ve been better than a U, but it still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shandra

customer_reviews.title: Love this little tent
customer_reviews.text: Love this little tent! I've only used it for a bathroom so far with a bucket toilet. I even hung a Chinese lantern inside for ambiance :) Pops right up, takes some practice putting it away but if you follow the instructions it's not difficult.
customer_reviews.author: abbysmom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! It popped right up, I was able to stand tall inside in 5”11 plenty of head space. I had it up, checked it out inside and down in 20 min. Taking it down is a bit of a challenge to get back in the circle shape. It’s not rocket science and easy to manipulate like those sun shades.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Serves its purpose. Not a rain proof item so be careful what you might store in this. Easy to put up and a bit of a pain to put away. Did hold up to pretty high wind when adequately staked . Easy to store and pack. Satisfied with the purchase., shopped a long time to pick it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved it. It was easy to put up and ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. It was easy to put up and the kids could get in and out with no problem. It did take a few tries to get it back to the shape it needed to be when we took it down, but once we had it, it was easy. I wish my tents were this easy. Now that we are home from camping I have it up in the back yard for the kids before and after swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up! I'm a spaz, so took a little longer to take down/fold. Don't over think it...just roll one wrist under the other and it folds up. IT'S TALL ENOUGH FOR ME @ 6'2"!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect changing tent for location photo shoots
customer_reviews.text: This is not too heavy to carry to a location to allow clients and models to change during a photo shoot. It is easy to set up, takes a bit of practice to get put away. My only regret is not buying it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Yannayon

customer_reviews.title: private, drains well, easy to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.text: We put ours up in the car wash bay out in the garage because we didn't have a shower out there, and it works great now we added the shower head to the hose yoke.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I have a more traditional shower tent which is a royal pain to set up. This one is a breaze. I'm not sure it would stand up to heavy winds, but that's not why I have it. I have it for simplicity. Plenty of room. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Barras

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up. Somewhat difficult to put away. Worked great. Im so glad I got this. Was definitely the hit of the camp.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene G.

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I used this a changing room for outdoor photography shoots. Sets up very easily and packs away not quite as easily. Why don't they make the stow bags a little bigger? The quality has been sufficient. I have no regrets purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: J. GLEASON

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy this one
customer_reviews.text: We loved this pop up. One trip it was used as a potty tent another a changing tent . Many of the other ones I saw were too narrow at the top and I don’t want the sides touching me. That won’t happen in this tent it’s plenty big enough for all sorts of uses. I agree buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Tauscher

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend one with a solid frame and hanger bar across
customer_reviews.text: The tent works. I would recommend one with a solid frame and hanger bar across. Can be a bit frustrating trying to find a tree with a branch low enough to hang your solar bag from.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Don't lose the instructions.
customer_reviews.text: This works well for our use. But "DON'T TOSS THE DIRECTIONS" It is tricky to break down and no way can you repack it without instructions. I WOULD SUGGEST TACKING THEM TO THE INSIDE POCKET.
customer_reviews.author: kindle customer.

customer_reviews.title: Challenge to fold back up, but I always had trouble with pool floats too.
customer_reviews.text: We used this at the state park where we stayed for 6 days. So simple to set up and so large inside to shower. We have a tiny shower in our camper so this was great to use. I put a small table inside to set soap and shampoo on, I also was able to set the shower head on the table while switched of while soaping up. I also bought a wooden shower mat to stand on so we weren’t standing in the mud. We are very satisfied and happy we bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Best

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for camping
customer_reviews.text: My husband used this for a little eating tent when camping and loved it! Small space but sturdy and extremely easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: St.

customer_reviews.title: Big and roomy love it
customer_reviews.text: We love this pop up shower tent we have a cabin with no shower in it we just open the tent and it just pops right up and we have solar shower we use with it works great and have a nice warm shower it grate love it it drys fast and folds right up
customer_reviews.author: cjm

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made and useful
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for getting the grandkids changed after time in the pool. That is the reason I purchased it, however, I can see that it would be useful for the beach and other roadtrips. It's made very well and should last for a long time. {Of course, that depends on how you use it and how often} I feel it is well worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Mindpalace

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Tent!!
customer_reviews.text: Set up was easy as was take down. It was the answer to our issue of trudging back and forth between our campsite and the showers! Nice material, zippers worked well, and the strip along the bottom made anchoring a breeze. Would highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck from Brandon

customer_reviews.title: It works as a privacy  place while camping, and there really is nothing else out there
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the chance to test the durability, but don't understand the comments on setting it up. This wound be better design if there was some sort of drain.
customer_reviews.author: lisaballow

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: It assembles practically on its own since it has wire! Easily transportable and to put it away it’s super easy. It has come in handy a lot! I might buy another. Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: RobReaper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, and tall
customer_reviews.text: We used this individual tent as a camping shower tent. It works great. The liner in the bottom is beneficial to stand on. The double windows are helpful to put the camp shower hose through either one. The only change I would ask for are larger loops on the outside to be able to hang a towel from.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fold
customer_reviews.text: I like to think I can refold mist tents. I need a degree to get this one back in the bag
customer_reviews.author: Tony Galluzzo

customer_reviews.title: Hard to close
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and seriously great if you’re always on the go. In Hawaii, we have a lot of beach’s with no bathrooms, so this and a portable toilet set up is really great! Only reason I didn’t rate it a 5star is because it’s so difficult to close up, I couldn’t figure it out for the life of me
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Provided Privacy
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to pop up and put back together. Served it purpose. So hot inside, take fan and leave open during day, but for cost worth it. Flimsy and light at. Make sure to sit on flat surface. We used it for changing since our tent was packed full.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Nantz

customer_reviews.title: It held up through strong desert winds.
customer_reviews.text: This pop up tent was simple to set up and lightweight. More importantly it withstood 25 mph winds for 4 days with no problems. Putting it away is a slight challenge but a great overall purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not see through!
customer_reviews.text: We used this at a campground and it worked great for the whole family. Even my 6'3" husband had plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Gmiata C

customer_reviews.title: Powerful product
customer_reviews.text: what a great product. As a homeless man, having a private place to shower and change is essential. This product provided me with the spark I needed to get back on my feet again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Todd Arthur

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Large size and easy setup makes this a prefect tent for a temporary dry composting toilet on a off the grid property in the construction stage.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Set up easier than fold down
customer_reviews.text: We used this on a movie shoot so the actors had a place to change. It’s roomy. Only thing is how comical it was trying to fold it back down to put it away. Three people tried it before someone used the hard-to-follow directions.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up...too bad it leaks in the rain. We had to put a tarp over it.
customer_reviews.author: MarylouD

customer_reviews.title: Great Pop Up!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to be a change room for my business when I am at events. I chose the shower one because the roof opens and there is a small window. This is perfect for really hot days because the air flows through it and doesn't get hot.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Powell

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Easy up, easy to store, works perfectly for outdoor camper shower. Challenging to re-package
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A Phillips

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for my use!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most pop up showers (and I have 2...now 3...lol) The sides DO NOT Sloop! (much). This means I can have my potty and my shower system in the same unit without the sides of pop up touching my body (eeeewww) This saved me from having 2 pop up shower side-by-side one for the potty and one for the shower. Saves me time & space... Solo... small set-up Glamper👍
customer_reviews.author: Black & Outdoorsy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect changing room
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it, I use it as a portable changing room when doing location photography. The top opens completely as well, this allows some good airflow sonit doesn’t get to hot.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect privacy tent. Spacious and quick set up. Folds up super easy and fits back in carrying bag. Just watch a YouTube video on how to do it. It is super simple. I wish all tents were this simple.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Set-up was easy. My main concern was getting it back to ...
customer_reviews.text: Set-up was easy. My main concern was getting it back to the original collapsed sized but after just a little playing with it I was able to get it back in the box it came in for storing until my next outing.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Works great for privacy for portable potty. For shower need to pitch it under a tree limb to hang shower bag I like the opening at the top and the the pockets inside for your shampoo etc. Easy to put up and take down (once you try it a few times). Very pleased with this tent!
customer_reviews.author: Dirt Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Have not used it yet.
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy. Gettin it back in it’s disc shape was a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Al Schamber

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our son for camping. They put a porta-pot in it and have a private bathroom out in the woods!
customer_reviews.author: M. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Cheap zippers
customer_reviews.text: Zipper on the storage back was broken when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this privacy tent! We put our portable toilet in it and it works perfect for our own little bathroom while we’re camping. There isn’t a rain-fly but when it rained, there wasn’t a single drop inside the tent...stayed totally dry. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C R

customer_reviews.title: Can see silhouette 👤!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s spacious and otherwise just what we’re looking for, BUT see-through! 😳 I will need to exchange for darker color.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient as a changing tent or a shower stall for camping. Also good for a Porta Potti. Must be staked or it blows over really easily.
customer_reviews.author: dab

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It works great but is a challenge to fold up
customer_reviews.author: Sam Babbitt

customer_reviews.title: great for a sukkah
customer_reviews.text: Great product ,used it so far like 5 times in one week, goes up in a flash , packs away nicely , after two tries or so you get the hang of it how to fold away
customer_reviews.author: mr z

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMPING SHOWER TENT
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing shower tent, for camping. That is what we use it for. Excellent, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Joscelyn Lauren

customer_reviews.title: works great as a dressing room for my pop ups
customer_reviews.text: works great as a dressing room for my pop ups. just a little tricky to fold back up. the carry bag would be better if it had 2 zippers instead of one but the product works great for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room. Buy this one
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to use and great design. Lots of room for two people like parent and child. Fast and efficient shipping. Exactly as described by manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Greywolf

customer_reviews.title: Privacy
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put up but harder to get back in the bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and pretty easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and pretty easy to set up and take down. I've used it for camping and it's awesome for changing at the beach in the parking lot.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Conway

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love how big it is inside, how easy it is to set up and take down, and that it has shelfs, a window, and nylon bottom runner to stand on. I used it on my last camping trip and everyone was jealous.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This tent is great for an outdoor shower. Has a surprisingly large interior.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor shower privacy.
customer_reviews.text: I searched for an easy and economical outdoor shower privacy solution and finally came upon this pop up shower tent. It is easy to “assemble”. The inside shower area is roomy. It’s perfect for our needs, wish that I found this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Easy up/ easy down
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, at least in my livingroom. There were no stakes and I thought it came with stakes. Should do what I want it for! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Best valu multi-purpose tent ever.
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother with the others! This one's great! folding back into the small circle will take some practice.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Good material
customer_reviews.text: This tent was good for the alaskan outdoors. Just make sure to stake it down w the stakes provided and you'll be fine!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Farley

customer_reviews.title: Toilet tent
customer_reviews.text: I fit toilet and stand in side w room to spare Big for dressing room ect Love size Sturdy made
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne grant

customer_reviews.title: Attachments,Size
customer_reviews.text: Great little enclosure.Has worked well for our camping.The draw string tie downs on the sides make for easy attachment to camper.For more beadsbugsandbows.blogspot.com
customer_reviews.author: retiredwithbeer

customer_reviews.title: I like that the floor is open this way it dries ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that the floor is open this way it dries faster if it gets wet. Also like that it is tall and Easy to open & close
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Changing Room
customer_reviews.text: Used for a changing room for 300+ volunteers over a four day festival. Plenty of room, good ventilation, sturdy in the wind. Looking forward to taking this remote camping for a porta john enclosure!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B

product_meta.title: Leader Accessories Pop Up Shower Tent Dressing Changing Tent Pod Toilet Tent 4' x 4' x 78"(H) Big Size
feature_bullets: Leader Accessories Pop Up Shower Tent offers a private room in a comfort size to dress up. Large zippered door for convenient access. Built-in entrance with zipper expediently in and out. Rust resistant and flexible steel frame for easy pop-up.
With part-bottom design could keep the room clean and offer a confort shower
4 pull strings with 8 metal mounting stakes could provide stability in windy conditions
Compact folding size and carrying bag with handles for easy taking along
4' x 4' x 78"(H) big size to provide temporary privacy and shelter for changing clothes, bathroom etc.
